EmailTemplate.name: GPDB_Sandbox Downloads_Q116.Surv
EmailTemplate.subject: Tell us about your experience with Greenplum Database Sandbox
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for downloading the Greenplum Database Sandbox!
Can we ask for 3 minutes of your time to answer a quick survey about your experience? Your feedback helps us make the Greenplum Database Sandbox better for everyone!
Click here <[[https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1CtIP_WcAVpZR8wk6Lp7ufKuu48n8WsL4BXD6joa_tIA/viewform?c=0&w=1]]> to start the survey.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
